title: UnitDefinition
description: Represents a unit definition that is based on the SI unit system. A unit may be a base unit or a derived unit composed of one or more factor units.

base_units.title: base_units
base_units.description: Base or factor units that define this unit.

id.title: id
id.description: Unique identifier of the unit definition.

name.title: name
name.description: Common or human-readable name of the unit definition.

BaseUnit.title: BaseUnit
BaseUnit.description: Represents a base or factor unit contributing to a derived unit definition.

exponent.title: exponent
exponent.description: Exponent of the base unit in the unit definition.

kind.title: kind
kind.description: Kind of the base unit (e.g., meter, kilogram, second).

multiplier.title: multiplier
multiplier.description: Multiplier applied to the base unit.

scale.title: scale
scale.description: Power-of-ten scale applied to the base unit.
